aggregate_queries.personel:
select timestamp,
       hospital,
       min(medics_total) as medics_total,
       max(quarantined_total) as quarantined_total,
       min(medics_30_50) as medics_30_50,
       max(quarantined_30_50) as quarantined_30_50,
       min(medics_over_50) as medics_over_50,
       max(quarantined_over_50) as quarantined_over_50,
       min(reanimatologists_total) as reanimatologists_total,
       min(quarantined_reanimatologists_total) as quarantined_reanimatologists_total,
       min(medic_supplies) as medic_supplies,
       min(trained_medics) as trained_medics
from (
select date_trunc('hour', to_timestamp(insert_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24')) as timestamp,
       "Įstaigos_pavadinimas" hospital,
       "Medikų_kiekis__VISO" medics_total,
       "Karantinuota__VISO" quarantined_total,
       "Medikų_kiekis_30___50_m_" medics_30_50,
       "Karantinuota_viso_30___50_m_" quarantined_30_50,
       "Medikų_kiekis_50__" medics_over_50,
       "Karantinuota_viso_50__" quarantined_over_50,
       "Medikai_reanimatologai__VISO" reanimatologists_total,
       "Karantinuota_reanimatologai__VISO" quarantined_reanimatologists_total,
       "Atsarga" medic_supplies,
       "Apmokyti_medikai" trained_medics
from personel) as d
group by hospital, timestamp
order by hospital, timestamp
aggregate_queries.inventory:
select timestamp,
       hospital,
       min(ffp2) as ffp2,
       min(ffp3) as ffp3,
       min(masks) as masks,
       min(face_shields) as face_shields,
       min(caps) as caps,
       min(glasses) as glasses,
       min(overals) as overals,
       min(robes) as robes,
       min(shoes) as shoes,
       min(reagents) as reagents,
       min(reagents_other) as reagents_other
from (
select date_trunc('hour', to_timestamp(insert_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24')) as timestamp,
       "Įstaigos_pavadinimas__pasirinkti_iš_sąrašo_" hospital,
       "Respiratorius_FFP2__vnt_" as ffp2,
       "Respiratorius_FFP3__vnt_" as ffp3,
       "Veido_kaukės__vienkartinės___vnt_" as masks,
       "Veido_skydai__vnt_" face_shields,
       "_Vienkartinės_kepuraitės__vnt_" caps,
       "_Apsauginiai_akiniai__vnt_" glasses,
       "Vienkartiniai_kombinezonai" overals,
       "Vienkartiniai_medicininiai_chalatai" robes,
       "Antbačiai" shoes,
       "Reagentai__vnt_" reagents,
       "Kitos_rūšies_reagentai__vnt_" reagents_other
from inventory) as d
group by hospital, timestamp
order by hospital, timestamp
